scripts.deploy: mkdir -p ../priv/static/ && cp -R static/* ../priv/static/ && parcel build js/*.js --out-dir ../priv/static/dist --public-url /dist --no-cache
scripts.watch: mkdir -p ../priv/static/ && cp -R static/* ../priv/static/ && parcel watch js/*.js --out-dir ../priv/static/dist --public-url /dist
